description:
we have learned to set up links with high redundancy dynamic routing protocol OSPF also have conducted verification tests which occur in the reality of any company.

The network administrator will be in charge of giving priority to the link that provides the best performance

at end of the course:

You will be able to configure OSPF with Link Redundancy

configure Redundancy Link high availability

You will be able to test routes principal and backup

the student will be able to configure and verify that the configured network does not have any logical failure and network traffic is not interrupted

This lab works on any Cisco ios
title: Cisco: advanced skills link High Availability OSPF
